mapper.insert: insert into payment(actual_price, is_successful, begin_time, end_time, order_id, gmt_create, gmt_modified, is_deleted,gmt_create,gmt_modified,end_time) values (#{actualPrice}, #{isSuccessful}, now(), date_add(now(), interval 30 minute), #{orderId}, now(), now(), #{beDeleted})
mapper.select: select * from payment where id = #{id} and is_deleted = 0
